biography_text: WEXTON, Jennifer, a Representative from Virginia; born in Washington, D.C., May 27, 1968; B.A., University of Maryland, College Park, Md., 1992; J.D., College of William and Mary Law School, Williamsburg, Va., 1995; lawyer, private practice; assistant commonwealth attorney, Loudon County, Va., 2001-2005; substitute judge, Loudon, Va., 2010-2011; member of the Virginia state senate, 2014-2018; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).

post_secondary_degrees.institution: University of Maryland, College Park, Md.
College of William and Mary Law School, Williamsburg, Va.
